entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow changing to flurries near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Rain showers and flurries beginning in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
